name: Brawl Brothers (1992)
description: Brawl Brothers, known in Japan as Rushing Beat Ran (ラッシング・ビート乱　複製都市, Rasshingu Biito Ran: Fukusei Toshi, "Rushing Beat Chaos: The City of Clones"), is a side-scrolling beat 'em up game developed and published by Jaleco for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1992. It is the second game in the Rushing Beat series, after Rival Turf!, and was followed by The Peace Keepers in 1993.
